thread.title: New Catalan leader calls for end of direct rule by Madrid

title: New Catalan leader calls for end of direct rule by Madrid
text:
May 15, 2018 / 3:11 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago New Catalan leader calls for end of direct rule by Madrid Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
MADRID (Reuters) - New Catalan leader Quim Torra on Tuesday called for an end to direct rule over the Catalan regional government by Madrid in a joint news conference held in Berlin with former regional leader Carles Puigdemont. Newly elected regional leader of Catalonia Quim Torra (back) and his predecessor Carles Puigdemont attend a news conference in Berlin, Germany May 15, 2018. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke
The first aim of the newly formed Catalan government would be to seek dialogue with Madrid, he said. Torra said he had travelled to Berlin to pay homage to former leader Puigdemont whom he called Cataloniaâ€™s legitimate president. Reporting by Sonya Dowsett; Editing by Alison Williams
